summary: Ore Veins will never be empty.
descriptionHtml:
Now you can take pieces that mine will never be exhausted.

installation:
This is a script, you should put in the folder called scripts. Skyrim\\Data\\Scripts ... The script folder is inside the DATA folder. as Hadvar says: Nice and easy

problems:
If you\'ve visited a site before you install this mod, nothing will change this location specifically. After installing the mod, look for a place never visited before. If you must all ore veins infinite, must wait three months (game time, not real) or start a new game. Or use some mod respawn fast like this one http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=89
__________
Edit: The folder is \"scripts\", not \"script\" 

If you like to hard working in the game look my another mod of continuons wood chop(no need to clik, clik and clik agains every 3 hits) http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8196
author: Thiago Serpa Alonso
